700462f-b.text:
Barker Ave. (left, not seen), adjoining and at the S.E. corner of Magenta Street. The 2-story dwelling is at the corner of the aforementioned streets, and the empty lot, in the foreground, adjoins it to the south. The view is from a point on the lot.
June 1, 1928.
P.L. Sperr.
700462f-b.folder: Barker Avenue & Magenta Street, Bronx, NY

700462f-a.text:
Barker Ave. (left, not seen), adjoining and at the S.E. corner of Magenta Street. The 2-story dwelling is at the corner of the aforementioned streets, and the empty lot, in the foreground, adjoins it to the south. The view is from a point on the lot.
June 1, 1928.
P.L. Sperr.
700462f-a.folder: Barker Avenue & Magenta Street, Bronx, NY

701420f-a.text:
Magenta Street (left), south side, east from Barker to Olinville Avenes. The long building, in the background, is Public School No. 41, at the S.E. corner of Olinville Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
701420f-a.folder: Magenta Street & Barker Avenue, Bronx, NY

701422f-a.text:
Magenta Street, north side, east from Barker Avenue to White Flains Road. On the latter appears part of the elevated structure
of the I.R.T. subway.
June 16, 1938
P. L. Sperr
701422f-a.folder: Magenta Street & Barker Avenue, Bronx, NY
